title: Stage Lv5-P1-S03
description: Level 5 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: Had I known about it, I would have acted differently.
Were I you, I would apologize.
learning_points: Level 5 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 그것에 대해 알았더라면 다르게 행동했을 것입니다.
sentences.en: Had I known about it, I would have acted differently.
Were I you, I would apologize.
Should you need assistance, please let me know.

sentences.kr: 더 일찍 출발했더라면 시간에 맞았을 텐데.
sentences.en: Had we left earlier, we would have been on time.
Were I to have money, I would buy that house.
Should any problems arise, contact us immediately.

sentences.kr: 진실을 알았더라면 그를 믿지 않았을 것입니다.
sentences.en: Had I known the truth, I would not have trusted him.

sentences.kr: 더 신중했다면 실수를 하지 않았을 텐데.
sentences.en: Were I to be more careful, I wouldn't have made mistakes.
